trans-unit.resname: DDL·4 | Cavalry Pegasus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDL·4 | Cavalry Pegasus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each attacking Human gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每个进行攻击的人类均获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DDL·11 | Anax and Cymede | Card Name
DDL·11 | Anax and Cymede | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDL·11 | Anax and Cymede | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets CARDNAME, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 勇行～每当你施放一个以CARDNAME为目标的咒语时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1且获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DDL·23 | Ordeal of Purphoros | Card Name
DDL·23 | Ordeal of Purphoros | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDL·23 | Ordeal of Purphoros | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的生物攻击时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。然后如果该生物上有三个或更多+1/+1指示物，则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: DDL·23 | Ordeal of Purphoros | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When you sacrifice CARDNAME, it deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 当你牺牲CARDNAME时，它对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DDL·43 | Polukranos, World Eater | Card Name
DDL·43 | Polukranos, World Eater | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
trans-unit.target: {X}{X}{G}：蛮化X。（如果此生物未蛮化，则在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物且它蛮化。）

trans-unit.resname: DDL·43 | Polukranos, World Eater | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME becomes monstrous, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures your opponents control. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Polukranos.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME蛮化时，它对任意数量之目标由对手操控的生物造成共X点伤害，你可以任意分配。这些生物各对波禄卡诺斯造成等同于前者力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DDL·47 | Satyr Hedonist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
DDL·66 | Destructive Revelry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。CARDNAME对该永久物的操控者造成2点伤害。
